review: I had visited the hospital and met the doctor for a gynae issue. Consultation was good with the doctor. I would like to recommend this doctor to my family and friends. Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation. Medical tests were done. There was more waiting time in the hospital, I waited for 30-35 minutes.

Itâ€™s been a month since i delivered a baby boy. Dr. Mani Priya has been extremely patient throughout my pregnancy with all my check ups and scans . She made sure I was made very comfortable and explained everything. Most importantly, she sat through my delivery process so patiently and made sure I had a normal n safe delivery. She kept in touch post delivery to make sure i was recovering well. Thank you doctor for all the help you have provided us. Much recommended gynaecologist doctor.
Supportive and friendly to talk with. Even after booking practo appointment wait time was 2 hour. No point of booking with practo, doesnt help.
